attributes.action: create and utilise a "journalist" visa for US Journalists travelling to the UK in connection with their employment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United States has implemented such a system since late 2001. Causing UK citizens to be denied entry to the states and deported home. We believe that it is only fair to require the same of United States Journalists.

Ref : "Welcome to America" The Guardian Newspaper, June 5, 2004
